name: Snake-Eye Oak
effectText: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 of your Level 1 FIRE monsters that is banished or in your GY; either add it to your hand or Special Summon it. You can send 2 face-up cards you control to the GY, including this card; Special Summon 1 "Snake-Eye" monster from your hand or Deck, except "Snake-Eye Oak". You can only use each effect of "Snake-Eye Oak" once per turn.
